tests.name: 01358_union_threads_bug.sql

tests.query: SELECT count() FROM (SELECT number FROM numbers_mt(1000000) ORDER BY number DESC LIMIT 100 UNION ALL SELECT number FROM numbers_mt(1000000) ORDER BY number DESC LIMIT 100 UNION ALL SELECT number FROM numbers_mt(1000000) ORDER BY number DESC LIMIT 100);
tests.name: 01358_union_threads_bug.sql

tests.query: select length(thread_ids) >= 16 from system.query_log where current_database = currentDatabase() AND event_date >= today() - 1 and query like '%SELECT count() FROM (SELECT number FROM numbers_mt(1000000) ORDER BY number DESC LIMIT 100 UNION ALL SELECT number FROM numbers_mt(1000000) ORDER BY number DESC LIMIT 100 UNION ALL SELECT number FROM numbers_mt(1000000) ORDER BY number DESC LIMIT 100)%' and type = 'QueryFinish' order by query_start_time desc limit 1;
tests.name: 01358_union_threads_bug.sql
